name: divassi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2))), wne(c2, nat0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))
-| wne(c2, nat0)
-| wi(wne(c2, nat0), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))
-| wne(c2, nat0)
-| wi(wne(c2, nat0), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c2, nat0), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2))))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))
-| wne(c2, nat0)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)

comment: An associative law for division. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-1995.)
